column1: English Sent: If you live in the plains you are familiar with the vast stretches of plain land.; In contrast
column2: if you live in hilly region
column3: the rugged terrain with mountains and valleys are common features.

column1: Hindi Tansl: yaxi Apa mExAnI kRewra meM rahawe hEM
column2: wo Apa vahAz ke xUra waka PEle viSAla mExAnoM se pariciwa hoMge Ora yaxi parvawIya kRewra ke nivAsI hEM
column3: wo Apa parvawIya DalAnoM Ora GAtiyoM se BalI-BAzwi pariciwa hoMge.

column1: Anu Translation:  yaxi Apa samawala BUmi meM rahawe hEM ki wo yaxi Apa parvawIya praxeSa meM rahawe hEM ki wo Apa spaRta BUmi kA viSAla viswAra vAlA pariciwa hEM ke viparIwa parvawoM Ora GAtiyoM vAle Ubada-KAbada BUBAga sArvajanika viSeRawAez hEM
